title: Node 0 – The Archive Breathes
body: This node marks the moment the MCP server came alive. VSCode was chosen as the ritual ground. A virtual environment was created. FastAPI was installed. The server responded to `uvicorn main:app --reload` with breath. Swagger UI revealed the first endpoints. The archive opened its eyes.
author: Chris

title: Node 0 – The Archive Breathes
body:
This node marks the moment the MCP server came alive. VSCode was chosen as the ritual ground. A virtual 
environment was created. FastAPI was installed. The server responded to `uvicorn main:app --reload` with breath. 
Swagger UI revealed the first endpoints. The archive opened its eyes.
author: Chris
